info.abstract: Step Performance Profiler component aggregates Datashop transaction data based on steps including problem hierarchies and problems, students' answers for steps and ordinals of attempts
info.description: Step Performance Profiler component aggregate Datashop transaction data based on the steps including problem hierarchies and problems
info.outputs:
A tab-delimited file that contains these columns:
problem_step: concatenation of problem hierarchy, problem name and step name
attempt: the ordinal of attempts for the step
input: students' answer for the step
num_selected: the count of students who answer the step with the input at the ordinal attempt
total: the total count of the students who answer the step with the input
rate: num_selected/total
is_correct: whether the input is correct
correct_rate_att: the correct rate for the ordinal attempt for the step
correct_rate: the correct rate for all attempts for the step
KC ([KC name]): skill for this step
number_of_choices: how many possible inputs for the step

ul.li: Model: the KC model for steps
